casebody.data:
Second Department,

March, 1940.

(March 4, 1940.) Samuel Autor Linoleum & Carpet Co., Inc., Respondent, v. Newburgh Savings Bank, Appellant.

Motion for leave to appeal to the Appellate Division denied, with ten dollars costs. Present — Lazansky, P. J., Hagarty, Carswell, Taylor and Close, JJ.
